2008-06-27 Timo Trautmann
modified mozileLoader.js for compatibility problems with firefox 3
122: if(!InstallTrigger.getVersion("mozile")) 
     -> 
	 if(!InstallTrigger.getVersion || !InstallTrigger.getVersion("mozile"))
155: if (!MOZILE_CONFIG_DOC.documentElement || MOZILE_CONFIG_DOC.documentElement.tagName == "parsererror") {
     ->
	 if (!MOZILE_CONFIG_DOC.documentElement) {
